titleStmt.title: Tiruveṇkāṭu [Veṇkāṭu - KV11], X temple, time of X, year X

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

ṟ ceyta pātapiṭattin meṟportta takaṭu nālu māṇiyumuṭpaṭappo
ṉ niṟai nūṟṟorupattoru kaḻañcu Ivarkkey cempināṟ ceyta panma
ttinmeṟ portta takaṭiraṇṭukku māṇikkumāka ponṉiṟai Irupatton
patin kaḻañcey mukkāl Ittevarkkey ceyta veḷḷip=rabhai 1 veḷḷi

ṉiṟai nūṟṟaiñpattonpatin kaḻañcey kāl Ittevarkku ceyta Āpa
raṇaṅkaḷ kuppi Iraṇṭum Uḻuttu Īraṇaiyum vāḷi Oṉṟumāka ponṉiṟai Iru ka

ṉṟu net=rattin poṟ tāṇicca paṭṭikai 1 pon Añkaḻañcu māṇikka

mūnṟu muttu Irunūṟṟorupattiraṇṭu Ittevaruṭaiya bhahuvalayam I

tu toṇṇūṟṟiraṇṭu veṇcāmarai Onṟu Itin kai ponṉiṟai muppatto[ru*]

varey kuṭutta tanavin kaṟikkāl Oṉṟu Ivvāṇṭey Ivare ku

ṇṭe Uṭaiyār śivaś=rād=dhañceyya nilavilaiyāka kuṭutta poṟpū O

vukkumāka varakkāṭṭina kācumāṟicceyta poṟpū Iruppattumūnṟu I
vai tevar paṇṭārattil vāṅkiya muttinkalloṭu niṟai nūṟṟo
rupatteṇkaḻañcu Ivarey varakkāṭṭina kācumāṟi nāmpirāṭṭiyārkku

tu kuṭutta paḷḷittoṅkal 1 Itil taccamoṭṭoṉṟu paṟaḷai 1 panañ

tevarkkey parāntakanmātevi kuṭutta tarānilaiviḷakku Ē
